column2: {% get_many_related_rec row.serum_sample.animal.studies row.serum_sample.animal.study as studies %}{% for study in studies %}{% if not forloop.first %}, {% endif%}{{ study.name|default_if_none:"None" }}{% empty %}None{% endfor %}
column9: {% if row.serum_sample.animal.treatment is None %}None{% else %}{{ row.serum_sample.animal.treatment.name|default_if_none:"None" }}{% endif %}
column13: {% get_many_related_rec row.serum_sample.animal.tracer_links.all row.tracer_link as tracer_links %}{% for tracer_link in tracer_links %}{% if not forloop.first %},{% endif%}{% if tracer_link.concentration is None %}None{% else %}{{ tracer_link.concentration }}{% endif %}{% empty %}None{% endfor %}
